alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 4:23PM PDT until November 05 at 7:17AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington...Oregon... Naselle River near Naselle affecting Wahkiakum and Pacific Counties. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trask River near Tillamook. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 16.5 feet, expect minor flooding along the lower Trask River. Dairy farms, buildings, and a few residences adjacent to the Trask in the vicinity of Hwy 101 may be threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM PDT Friday the stage was 12.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 17.4 feet around 9 pm, then fall below flood stage after midnight. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 3 AM PDT Saturday.
